ContextWise: Your Intelligent Grammar Companion
ContextWise is a Chrome Extension designed to provide clear and precise grammar explanations for highlighted text. Whether you're refining your writing or seeking deeper understanding, ContextWise offers insightful assistance directly in your browser.

This extension is not a translation tool. Instead, it focuses solely on grammar explanations, addressing a gap left by translation tools that prioritize converting meaning but often overlook structural clarity.

Benefits of Using ContextWise
Enhanced Grammar Understanding
ContextWise offers detailed grammar explanations, helping users learn and improve their writing by understanding the structure of their sentences.

Customizable Language Settings
Users can set their preferred language for grammar explanations, tailoring the tool to meet specific learning or professional needs.

Simple and Efficient Workflow
Highlight any text, and with just a press of Ctrl + Shift + E, or a right-click to select from the context menu, you can instantly access a grammar explanation.

Powered by OpenAI Technology
Leveraging the power of OpenAIâ€™s advanced models, ContextWise delivers accurate and reliable grammar insights.

Seamless Integration
The extension works effortlessly in your Chrome browser, requiring no additional software.

How to Use ContextWise
Setup

Register your OpenAI API Key within the extension settings.
Specify the target language for grammar explanations. (e.g., English, French, Spanish)
Highlight and Activate

Highlight the desired text in your browser.
Press Ctrl + Shift + E or access the feature through the context menu.
Receive Explanations

Instantly receive grammar insights in your chosen language, directly within your browser.
ContextWise simplifies the process of understanding complex grammar, empowering users to communicate with greater confidence and clarity.
